name: Ascii Thief
description:
An ascii thief on a mission to rob the world.

Play as an Ascii Thief ready to rob the world of coins and stagger enemies to pass through them efficiently.

Find out what is the highest number of coins you can collect while keeping the number of deaths the least.

Good Luck!

Controls:

Use arrow keys to move up, down, left and right.

Use 'R' to restart the level.

ASCII TABLE
  • Enemy  :  E
  • Player   :  @
  • Walls     :  #
  • Goal       :  G
  • Coins     :  o

Inspired by "The World's Hardest Game."
